#random program given to illustrate the working of CBZ and B (check whether both of them are used in this program or not, you may modify the program)
0000000000000000 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000001 00A00001 //LDUR X1,[X0,#0]
0000000000000002 00A00002 //LDUR X2,[X0,#0]
0000000000000003 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000004 00010023 //ADD X3, X1, X1
0000000000000005 00210044 //SUB X4, X2, X1
0000000000000006 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000007 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000008 07000084 //CBZ X4,#4
0000000000000009 001F03FF //NOP
000000000000000A 001F03FF //NOP
000000000000000B 23FFFFF9 //B #-7
000000000000000C 001F03FF //NOP
000000000000000D 001F03FF //NOP
